snippet: Eco-sculptures are the latest indication that Mexico City has become a leader in environmental efforts for the developing world.
abstract: Mexico City Journal; three vertical gardens installed by nonprofit VerdMX across Mexico City function as both public art and filters for city's notoriously bad air pollution, and are an example of how the city has become a leader in environmental efforts for the developing world.
lead_paragraph: Eco-sculptures are the latest indication that Mexico City has become a leader in environmental efforts for the developing world.

headline.seo: Vertical Gardens in Mexico a Symbol of Progress
headline.main: Lush Walls Rise to Fight a Blanket of Pollution
headline.print_headline: Lush Walls Rise to Fight A Blanket Of Pollution
